top.title: Inside Gaza, BBC sees total devastation after two years of war
top.summary: With endless rubble and destroyed streets as far as the eye can see, any plans for Gaza's future are a far cry from where it is today, writes Lucy Williamson.

top.title: Conservative justices sharply question Trump tariffs in high-stakes hearing
top.summary: If the court rules against Trump's tariffs, it could force the US to refund some of the billions it has collected.

top.title: US to cut flights at 40 airports if shutdown doesn't end, transportation secretary warns
top.summary: Flight capacity will be cut 10% across the country, as air traffic controllers report experiencing fatigue, Transportation Secretary Sean Duffy said.

top.title: King handed Nvidia boss a letter warning of AI dangers
top.summary: In the 2023 remarks from the King he said AI was "no less important than the discovery of electricity" but warned the risks must be tackled.

top.title: MP wants Elon Musk's chatbot shut down over claim he enabled grooming gangs
top.summary: SNP MP Pete Wishart says he is seeking legal advice over the "disturbing" AI-generated social media post.

top.title: France moves to suspend Shein website as it opens first store in Paris
top.summary: The economy ministry said proceedings would last until Shein proved all of its content complied with French law.

title.#text: Canon adds a 32-megapixel sensor and 7K video to the new EOS R6 Mark III
Rode’s all-in-one video production console is now smaller and cheaper
